title: (STICKY THIS RIOT) Unable to move/interact bug FIX
body:
Just turn off your discord overlay. 


little flame to throw because I lost my ranked match and my friends placement: Riot posted the fix to their twitter but didnt think to post the fix in the HELP & SUPPORT forums.

replies.body:
Ehhhhhh I'll just leave this here fam ^_^
